description:
On railway planning, linking demand and supply is a challenge to project, provide and validate better international services that are both reliable and of high quality. We present a Python tool to estimate railway traffic demand through the detection of a set of geotagged tweets overlapping railway lines in Europe.


http://2016.es.pycon.org/
title: Antònia Tugores - Using social media geotagged data to estimate railway use - PyConES 2016
